      • leaseCash

        public static void leaseCash(int days)
        7) Calculate how much it will cost renting an apartment for a given number of days, if you know, that for 1 day its cost is 40 UAH. And, if the tenant has lived in it more than 5 days, he will receive discount 20 UAH, and if more than 7 days, the discount will be 50 UAH.
        Parameters:
        days - number of lease days
